data.name: pathDistance
data.description: Computes distance between two paths by projecting positions of the second (acquired) path onto the first (reference) one. This allows to compare paths with different location counts.

return.description: a vector projection on the reference path

data.name: ClusteringTree
data.description: Computes average path segments from an ensemble of paths.

return.description: Returns an array of average paths for this tree
